Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: トーマ
Entry.EnglishText: Tohma

Entry.JapaneseText: アムジル
Entry.EnglishText: Amjeel

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: ナイラ
Entry.EnglishText: Nayla

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 迷いの森
Entry.EnglishText: Forest Labyrinth

Entry.JapaneseText: 迷いの森
Entry.EnglishText: Forest Labyrinth

Entry.JapaneseText: 迷いの森
Entry.EnglishText: Forest Labyrinth

Entry.JapaneseText: どこまで逃げるつもりだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Just how long are you going to keep running?

Entry.JapaneseText: このトーマ、 あまり気の長い方ではない。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't have much patience, now.

Entry.JapaneseText: これ以上、わずらわせるなら、 命の保証はできんぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you continue to be a thorn in my side, I can't guarantee that you'll be spared.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……俺の命にかえても、 妻と娘は守ってみせる!!
Entry.EnglishText: I'll protect my wife and daughter, even if it costs me my life!

Entry.JapaneseText: その覚悟や良し。だが!!
Entry.EnglishText: Your resolve is admirable. However...!

Entry.JapaneseText: ぐああああぁぁぁぁぁッ……！ ナ、ナイラ……<Hilda>……
Entry.EnglishText: Guaaahh!! N-Nayla... <Hilda>...

Entry.JapaneseText: お父さん!!
Entry.EnglishText: Father!

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、あなた!!
Entry.EnglishText: D-Dear!

Entry.JapaneseText: やめて!! どうして!! どうしてこんな事をするの!! 娘を……娘を返して!!
Entry.EnglishText: Stop! Why are you doing this?! Give her back! Give me back my daughter!

Entry.JapaneseText: 消えろ…… 同じガジュマとして、 せめてもの情けだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Get lost. I'll show you a little mercy since we're both Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: いや…… いやぁぁぁぁぁぁぁッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: No... NOOO!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 「迷いの森」か……
Entry.EnglishText: The Forest Labyrinth, huh...

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、なんだか同じところを グルグルと回ってる気がしない……？
Entry.EnglishText: Is it just me, or does it feel like we've been wandering around in circles?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……おそらく、 ここは「迷いの森」だろう。
Entry.EnglishText: ...This must be the Forest Labyrinth.

Entry.JapaneseText: 迷いの森？
Entry.EnglishText: Forest Labyrinth?

Entry.JapaneseText: うかつに踏み込めば、 方向を見失って出られなくなると 聞いた事がある。
Entry.EnglishText: If you enter unprepared, you will lose your way and become lost in the maze forever. Or so they say.

Entry.JapaneseText: 出られなくなったら ボクたちどうなっちゃうの……？
Entry.EnglishText: If we don't make it out, what will happen to us...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 永遠に森の中を さまようしかないだろうな。
Entry.EnglishText: We will wander in these woods for all eternity, I suppose.

Entry.JapaneseText: うそー!? そんなのボク、ヤだヨー!!
Entry.EnglishText: What!? You'd better be joking!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここを抜ける方法は？
Entry.EnglishText: How do we get out of here?

Entry.JapaneseText: 残念だが、俺は知らない。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm afraid I don't know.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしよう？ ここを抜けないかぎり、 ペトナジャンカへは行けないよ？
Entry.EnglishText: Now what? We'll never make it to Petnadjanka if we can't find our way out of here.

Entry.JapaneseText: とにかく進むしかない。行こう。
Entry.EnglishText: All we can do is keep going. Come on.

Entry.JapaneseText: そっちはダメ。
Entry.EnglishText: That isn't the way out.

Entry.JapaneseText: 道はこっちしかないよ？
Entry.EnglishText: But this is the only direction the path goes in...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっちへ進んでも迷うだけ。
Entry.EnglishText: Going that way will only get you lost.

Entry.JapaneseText: この森の抜け方を知っているのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you know these woods?

Entry.JapaneseText: どこいくの<Annie>？
Entry.EnglishText: Where are you going, <Annie>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 正しい道はこっち。
Entry.EnglishText: To the correct path, which is here.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここって、 ただの草むらなんですけど？
Entry.EnglishText: I'm pretty sure that's just a bush...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>、フォルスで そこの草むらを焼くんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>, burn it with your Force.

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、そっか…… うん、わかった。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, okay... I think I get it.

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなところに道が……
Entry.EnglishText: A hidden path...

Entry.JapaneseText: 昔、まだ人がここに住んでいた頃、 外部の侵入者を防ぐために、 自然を利用して迷路を作ったそうです。
Entry.EnglishText: Long ago, people lived in this forest. They used the surrounding plant life to create a maze in order to deter intruders.

Entry.JapaneseText: へえ、よく知ってるね？
Entry.EnglishText: Wow, how do you know all this?

Entry.JapaneseText: お父さんについて医者の勉強をしてた頃、 よくこの森に薬草を採りに来た事が あったから。
Entry.EnglishText: When I was studying medicine under my father, we would often come here to gather medicinal herbs.

Entry.JapaneseText: へー、<Annie>ってお医者さん 目指してるんだね♪
Entry.EnglishText: Ooh, so <Annie> wants to become a doctor! ♪

Entry.JapaneseText: 迷路の仕掛けは他にもあるって 聞いてます。
Entry.EnglishText: I've also heard there are traps hidden within the labyrinth.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうか……気をつけて進もう。
Entry.EnglishText: I see... We should move carefully.

Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.Notes: DON'T EDIT THIS, IT'S A DUMMY ENTRY

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>このエリアのバイラスは、 味方キャラクターの ラッシュゲージが一定以下の時、 自動的に防御をしてきます。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>An enemy will automatically defend itself when attacked by an ally whose Rush Gauge is under a certain level.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>ラッシュチャージを行ったり、 他の味方の連携に加わるなどして、 防御されにくい作戦を取りましょう。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>When this happens, raise your RG Gauge and cooperate with your allies in order to break the enemy's defenses.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>また、<Red>料理<Green>には戦闘開始時の ラッシュゲージを上げる料理が あります。うまく利用して下さい。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>There are also <Red>recipes<Green> which raise your own Rush Gauge at the start of battle. Use them wisely.

Entry.JapaneseText: 同じところをグルグル回ってるよー!!
Entry.EnglishText: We keep going in circles!

Entry.JapaneseText: おそらくここは「迷いの森」だ。 うかつに踏み込むと出られなくなる。
Entry.EnglishText: This must be the Forest Labyrinth. It's said, If you venture in without proper preparation, you might end up lost forever.

Entry.JapaneseText: 逆方向へ来ちゃったんだよ、 ミナールは森を出て北東の方角だヨ！
Entry.EnglishText: We're right back where we started; Minal is northeast once we leave the forest!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>を早く医者に診せなければ…… ……急ごう！
Entry.EnglishText: We've gotta get <Annie> to the doctor... Let's hurry!

Entry.JapaneseText: 同じところをグルグル回ってるみたいだね。
Entry.EnglishText: It feels like we're going around in circles.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうか…… おそらくここは「迷いの森」だろう。
Entry.EnglishText: I see... This place must be the Forest Labyrinth.

Entry.JapaneseText: 迷いの森？
Entry.EnglishText: Forest Labyrinth?

Entry.JapaneseText: うかつに踏み込めば、 方向を見失って出られなくなると 聞いた事がある。
Entry.EnglishText: If you enter unprepared, you will lose your way and become lost in the maze forever. Or so they say.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここを抜ける方法は？
Entry.EnglishText: How do we get out of here?

Entry.JapaneseText: 残念だが俺は知らない。
Entry.EnglishText: I regret to say this, but I do not know.

Entry.JapaneseText: うーん……どうしよっか？
Entry.EnglishText: Mhmm... What should we do?

Entry.JapaneseText: 今の目的地はミナールだ。 無理に迷いの森に入る必要はない。 引き返して、ミナールへ向かおう。
Entry.EnglishText: We're currently headed to Minal. We don't need to waste time with the Forest Labyrinth. Let's turn back and make our way there.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
